title: Clara Barton National Historic Site: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture       Take a virtual tour at: https://www.nps.gov/features/clba/feat0001/flash.html Complete the educational activities section of the virtual tour, print and mail us the certificate and receive a Clara Barton NHS web ranger Junior Ranger Badge.      Are you looking for "primary source" documents or photographs of Clara Barton? We have some resources in this web site which you may find helpful.  We have transcriptions of some primary source materials, use this link to reach the table of contents. We have photographs of Clara Barton posted in our photo gallery. You may also download and print a 25 page document containing the photographs and the stories behind her receiveing international medals and awards. (pdf format-approx. 4 mb file)      Clara Barton NHS - Historic Furnishings Report - pdf file link; full publication of over 500 pages. (4.28 mb file) The Historic Furnishing Plan was developed by the National Park Service/Harpers Ferry Center in 1983. It serves as the guiding document for the restoration and furnishings of the rooms at Clara Barton National Historic Site.
